Title: Smoldering Children
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), James Wong
Actors: Dylan McDermott, Connie Britton, Evan Peters, Taissa Farmiga
Plot: In 1994, Larry gets burned. In the present, Ben begins to understand what happened to cause Vivien's institutionalization. Constance is questioned by the police in Travis' death. Violet learns something about herself that she doesn't know.
